datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to harnessing solar energy, photovoltaic technology, and sustainable power systems.

columns.name: surface_temperature
columns.description: Average daily surface temperature in degrees Celsius.

columns.name: inverter_type
columns.description: Type of inverter used in the solar panel system

columns.name: solar_panel_age
columns.description: Age of the solar panels in years

columns.name: average_daily_sunlight
columns.description: Average daily hours of sunlight in the region

columns.name: electricity_generated
columns.description: Amount of electricity generated in kilowatt-hours

columns.name: annual_snowfall
columns.description: Annual snowfall measured in centimeters

columns.name: temperature
columns.description: Average temperature during the month

columns.name: cell_color
columns.description: Color of the photovoltaic cells in the solar panels

columns.name: industrial_area_presence
columns.description: Indicator if the area has significant industrial activity.

columns.name: predicted_snowfall
columns.description: Anticipated annual snowfall estimation

columns.name: season
columns.description: The season of the year

columns.name: locality_solar_energy_usage_percentile
columns.description: Percentile ranking of solar energy usage in the locality

columns.name: tree_coverage
columns.description: Indicates presence of trees near the house (true or false)

columns.name: efficiency_gain
columns.description: Represents the efficiency improvement or gain observed in the solar panel system

columns.name: average_daylight_duration
columns.description: The average number of sunlight hours per day in the region.

columns.name: solar_intensity_zone
columns.description: Categorical classification of regions based on average annual solar radiation received.

columns.name: average_wind_speed
columns.description: Average wind speed in km/h during the month

columns.name: daylight_to_night_ratio
columns.description: The ratio of daylight hours to night hours

columns.name: month
columns.description: Month during which the electricity generation data was recorded

columns.name: sunlight_hours
columns.description: Total hours of sunlight received per day.

columns.name: number_of_clear_days
columns.description: Annual count of days classified as clear with minimal cloud cover

columns.name: day_length
columns.description: Total day length in hours.

columns.name: altitude
columns.description: The elevation of the location of the house in meters

columns.name: average_daylight_hours
columns.description: Average number of sunlight hours the home receives per day

columns.name: average_daily_temperature_variation
columns.description: The average daily temperature fluctuation in degrees Celsius.

columns.name: region_type
columns.description: The classification of the region where the house is located

columns.name: high_efficiency_appliances
columns.description: Indicates whether the household uses high-efficiency appliances (true or false)

columns.name: region
columns.description: Geographic region of the solar paneled home

columns.name: cloud_cover_ratio
columns.description: Ratio of days with significant cloud cover to clear days annually

columns.name: home_energy_storage_capacity
columns.description: Home's energy storage system capacity in kilowatt-hours

columns.name: roof_orientation
columns.description: Orientation of the roof primarily installed with solar panels

columns.name: average_temperature
columns.description: The annual average temperature in degrees Celsius where the house is located

columns.name: solar_panel_efficiency
columns.description: The efficiency rating of solar panels commonly used in the region, expressed as a percentage.

columns.name: is_winter
columns.description: Indicates whether the record is during winter months (December to February)

columns.name: has_solar_panels
columns.description: Whether the location has solar panels installed.

columns.name: insolation_level
columns.description: Measured solar radiation incident on the solar panel

columns.name: hours_of_sunlight
columns.description: Average daily hours of sunlight

columns.name: cloud_cover_rate
columns.description: Percentage of the sky covered by clouds.

columns.name: wind_speed
columns.description: Average wind speed in km/h.

queries.question: Is there a relationship between the color of photovoltaic cells, the month, the efficiency gain, and the average daily sunlight in predicting efficiency gains in solar paneled homes?
queries.true_hypothesis: Solar paneled homes with blue-colored photovoltaic cells record efficiency gains when the cell color is blue, month is between October and March, and the average daily sunlight is less than 5 hours.
